Represents a single line in the financial statement

Individual payment record in Section C
Represents a single payment transaction

C12ReportParsed.description: Fully parsed C12 report with structured sections

sectionA.description: Section A: Previous Period Balance (empty if not found)

sectionB.description: Section B: Current Period Activity (empty if not found)

sectionC.description: Section C: Payments Made (empty if not found)

sectionD.description: Section D: Payment Allocation (empty if not found)

sectionDau.description: Section Đ: Carried Forward (empty if not found)

C12ReportResponse.description: Combined C12 report response with both raw and parsed data

Payment transaction record from BHXH Code 514

BHXH beneficiary bank account information
Represents a single bank account where payments can be sent

Unit information for payment initialization (structure TBD)
Will be updated based on actual API response from Code 503

Document types: Sổ hộ khẩu, CCCD, etc.

Employee sync response (Code 156)
Official employee data from central BHXH system

Create/Update department request (Code 077)
Uses id field to determine create (null) vs update (existing)

Full D02-TS Employee Record
Complete structure as sent to BHXH API Code 084

phuCapTNVK.description: Seniority allowance - thâm niên vượt khung

VtvlKhacTungay.description: Vtvl = Việc làm việc khác (Other work) - Start

VtvlKhacDenngay.description: Vtvl = Việc làm việc khác - End

VtvlNqlTungay.description: Nql = Nghỉ việc làm lại (Return from leave) - Start

VtvlCmktbtTungay.description: Cmktbt = Chấm dứt mút ký theo bản khác (Other contract end)

NndhTungay.description: Nndh = Nghỉ việc không hưởng lương (Unpaid leave)

HdldTungay.description: Hdld = Hợp đồng lao động (Labor contract)

HdldXdthTungay.description: Xdth = Hợp đồng thử việc (Probation contract)

Tenphuongan.description: Method name in Vietnamese (same as Tenphongban - likely a typo in API)

Record_string.unknown_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

nguoiLaoDong.description: Employee list (null at top level, actual data in form sections)

parameters.description: Optional request body with force flag
parameters.name: body

get.description:
Get C12 monthly payment obligation report
Returns both raw hierarchical data and parsed structured sections

Get payment transaction history
Returns electronic payment records with pagination

Get BHXH beneficiary bank accounts
Returns list of valid bank accounts for BHXH payments
Get unit payment information for payment initialization

Generate payment reference string
Creates standardized BHXH payment reference format

parameters.description: Unit code (optional, uses session default if not provided)
parameters.name: unitCode

parameters.description: Agency code (optional, uses session default if not provided)
parameters.name: agencyCode

get.description:
Get paper types (Code 071)
Document types: Sổ hộ khẩu, CCCD/ĐDCN, etc.

Get countries (Code 072)
ISO country codes with Vietnamese names

Get ethnicities (Code 073)
Vietnamese ethnic groups: Kinh, Tày, Thái, etc.

500.description: Failed to fetch labor plan types

get.description:
Get labor plan types (Code 086)
Employment change categories: Tăng lao động, Giảm lao động, etc.

Get benefits (Code 098)
Social insurance benefit types (Chế độ): Dưỡng sức, ốm đau, etc.

Get relationships (Code 099)
Family/household relationships: Chủ hộ, Vợ, Chồng, Con, etc.

parameters.description: Province code (2-digit, e.g., "79" for Ho Chi Minh City)
parameters.name: maTinh

get.description: Get all employees for current unit

Get employee by ID (Code 172)
Fetches employee detail from internal record by ID

put.description:
Update employee (Code 068)
Note: Requires full employee data structure - use GET /employees/{id} first to retrieve current data

post.description:
Get full employee details by IDs (Code 117)
Fetches comprehensive employee data including contracts, salary, family, history

Bulk upload employees from Excel file (Code 112)
Note: Requires multipart/form-data with Excel file

get.description:
Sync employee with central BHXH system (Code 156)
Fetches official employee data from central BHXH using Social Security Number

Get department by ID (via list + filter)
Note: BHXH API doesn't have direct get-by-id, so we filter the list

post.description:
Submit Code 600 declaration form (Code 084)
Submits D02-TS (registration/adjustment), TK1-TS (summary), or D01-TS (termination) forms

**Form Types:**
- D02-TS: Employee registration/adjustment (Đăng ký, điều chỉnh đóng BHXH)
- TK1-TS: Summary report (Tờ khai tổng hợp)
- D01-TS: Employee termination (Giảm lao động)

**Method Codes (phuongAn):**
- TM: Tăng mới (New Registration)
- DC: Điều chỉnh (Adjustment)
- TT: Tăng thêm (Additional Increase)

parameters.description: Declaration form data with thuTuc metadata and form sections
parameters.name: submitRequest
